content:
Hi {name},

Great news — your order has been confirmed! Here's a quick summary:

Order Number: [order number]
Items: [item list]
Total: [amount]
Estimated Delivery: {date}

You'll receive a shipping confirmation with tracking details once your order is on its way. If you have any questions in the meantime, just reply to this message.

Thank you for shopping with {company}!

Hi {name},

Your order is on its way! Here are your shipping details:

Order Number: [order number]
Carrier: [carrier name]
Tracking Number: [tracking number]
Estimated Delivery: {date}

You can track your package here: [tracking link]

If you have any questions about your delivery, don't hesitate to reach out. We hope you love your purchase!

Best,
{company}

Hi {name},

Your order has been delivered! We hope everything arrived in perfect condition.

Order Number: [order number]
Delivered: {date}

If anything isn't quite right or you have questions about your items, please let us know within [return window] days and we'll make it right.

Enjoy your purchase!

{company}

Hi {name},

We've received your return request for order [order number] and I'm happy to help.

Here's how to send your item back:

1. Pack the item securely in its original packaging if possible
2. Print the prepaid return label attached to this message
3. Drop off the package at your nearest [carrier] location

Once we receive and inspect the item, your refund will be processed within 5-7 business days.

If you have any questions about the process, just let me know.

Best,
{company}

Hi {name},

Your refund has been processed! Here are the details:

Order Number: [order number]
Refund Amount: [amount]
Refund Method: [original payment method]

Please allow 5-10 business days for the credit to appear on your statement, depending on your bank or payment provider.

We're sorry this purchase didn't work out. If there's anything we can do better, we'd love to hear your feedback.

Best,
{company}

Hi {name},

We'd be happy to exchange your item. Here's what I need from you:

- Order Number: [order number]
- Item to exchange: [item name]
- Preferred replacement: [size/color/variant]

Once confirmed, we'll send your replacement right away and include a prepaid return label for the original item. There's no additional charge for the exchange.

Just reply with those details and I'll get it set up for you!

{company}

Hi {name},

Thanks for your interest in [product name]! Here's what I can tell you:

{cursor}

If you'd like more details or have specific questions about sizing, materials, compatibility, or anything else, I'm happy to help.

You can view the full product page here: [product link]

Best,
{company}

Hi {name},

Great question about sizing! Here are our recommendations for [product name]:

- Refer to our size guide here: [size guide link]
- This item tends to run [true to size / slightly small / slightly large]
- If you're between sizes, we recommend going [up/down]

Your measurements compared to our chart suggest a [size] would be the best fit. If it doesn't work out, our free exchange policy makes it easy to swap for a different size.

Hope that helps!

{company}

Hi {name},

Thank you for your interest in [product name]. Unfortunately, this item is currently out of stock.

Here's what I can do:

- Add you to our restock notification list so you'll be the first to know when it's back
- Suggest a similar alternative: [alternative product link]
- Place a backorder if available (estimated restock: {date})

Would any of these options work for you? Just let me know and I'll set it up.

Best,
{company}

Hi {name},

Good news — [product name] is back in stock! We know you were waiting for this one, so we wanted to give you a heads-up before it sells out again.

Grab yours here: [product link]

As a thank you for your patience, use code [discount code] for [X]% off your purchase.

Happy shopping!

{company}

Hi {name},

We've got something special for you! For a limited time, enjoy [X]% off your next order at {company}.

Use code: [discount code]
Valid through: {date}

This applies to [all items / selected categories / orders over $X]. Browse our latest collection here: [shop link]

Don't miss out — the offer expires soon!

Happy shopping,
{company}

Hi {name},

Our biggest sale of the season is here! Enjoy up to [X]% off across [categories/entire store].

Sale runs: {date} through [end date]
Shop now: [sale link]

Here are some top picks we think you'll love:
- [Product 1]
- [Product 2]
- [Product 3]

Free shipping on all orders over $[amount]. Don't wait — popular items sell out fast!

Best,
{company}

Hi {name},

We hope you're enjoying your recent purchase from {company}! It's been a couple of weeks since your order arrived, and we'd love to hear what you think.

Leaving a review only takes a minute and helps other shoppers make informed decisions:

[Review link]

As a thank you, you'll receive [reward/discount] for every review you submit.

Thank you for being a valued customer!

{company}

Hi {name},

We noticed you left some great items in your cart! Just wanted to make sure you didn't forget about them:

[Cart items summary]

Your cart is saved and ready when you are: [cart link]

Need help deciding? Reply to this message and we'll answer any questions you have about the products. Or if something went wrong during checkout, we're here to help.

See you soon,
{company}

Hi {name},

Still thinking about those items in your cart? We get it — sometimes you need a little nudge.

Here's one: use code [discount code] for [X]% off your order if you complete your purchase in the next 48 hours.

Your cart: [cart link]

This offer is exclusive to you and expires on {date}. Don't let your favorites slip away!

{company}

Hi {name},

Thanks for being a loyal {company} customer! Here's an update on your rewards:

Current Points: [points balance]
Rewards Tier: [tier name]
Points to Next Reward: [points needed]

You can redeem your points at checkout or save up for bigger rewards. Check your full rewards dashboard here: [rewards link]

Keep shopping to unlock even more perks!

Best,
{company}

Hi {name},

Congratulations — you've reached [tier name] status in our loyalty program! As a VIP member, you now enjoy:

- [Perk 1, e.g., free shipping on all orders]
- [Perk 2, e.g., early access to new arrivals]
- [Perk 3, e.g., exclusive member-only discounts]
- [Perk 4, e.g., priority customer support]

Thank you for choosing {company}. We're excited to give you the best shopping experience possible.

Welcome to the inner circle!

{company}

Hi {name},

Based on your recent purchase of [previous product], we thought you might also like these:

1. [Product recommendation 1] — [brief reason]
2. [Product recommendation 2] — [brief reason]
3. [Product recommendation 3] — [brief reason]

Shop these picks: [recommendations link]

All of these pair perfectly with what you already own. Plus, enjoy free shipping on orders over $[amount].

Happy browsing!

{company}

Hi {name},

We wanted to give you an update on your order [order number]. Unfortunately, there's been an unexpected delay, and your new estimated delivery date is {date}.

We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. Here's what happened: {cursor}

To make it up to you, we'd like to offer [compensation — e.g., free expedited shipping, discount on next order]. Your updated tracking information is available here: [tracking link]

If you'd prefer to cancel for a full refund, just let us know and we'll process it right away.

Thank you for your patience and understanding.

{company}
